explanation: [0-0] Two ladies are standing in a room. The woman on the left is wearing a red Indian wedding dress with gold embroidery, a matching headscarf, a green necklace, and a red dot on her forehead. She is looking to the left with her right hand on her right shoulder. The woman on the right is wearing a red dress with a white floral pattern and has long hair draped over her shoulders. She is looking forward, supporting herself with her right arm behind her. Behind them is a white wall decorated with white flowers, with some items piled up below. There is a fan and a white, air conditioner-like object hanging on the wall. On the left side of the wall is a yellow balcony-like decoration with white and purple flowers. On the far left is a green decoration.
